summary: This mod brings a few changes to the well-known Companions, Farkas and Vilkas. Only their appearance is a bit changed. The dirt from their face is removed and the warpaint isn't as clear as before.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#b6b6b6]Greetings, fellow Skyrim lovers! [/color]

[/size][size=3]This mod has the purpose to give you a version of cleaner Farkas and Vilkas. 

[/size][b][size=4][color=#ffff00]Why?[/color]

[/size][/b][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS]I was playing Skyrim when I asked my mom if she liked Vilkas (my husband in one of my Skyrim saves) and she replied that she thought that his face was too dirty. Well... I didn't care about that comment (she doesn't play Skyrim, so she doesn't understand the whole warrior-thing), but she definitely inspired me to make a new mod, so here it is...[/font]

[/size][size=4][color=#ffff00]What's new at these brothers?[/color]

[/size][size=3]I have "cleaned" their faces, changed their hairstyles, altered their faces just a little bit so that they're more proportioned and made their warpaint (around the eyes) more transparent.[/size]

[size=4][color=#ffff00]What other mods have you used? I want the same look for Farkas and Vilkas.[/color]

[/size][size=3]First of all, I have used the latest Skyrim update. Secondly, the Apachii hair mod is a must!!! Otherwise, it is most likely that this mod won't give you the desired results.
Here is a link to Apachii's mod I have used:[color=#00ff00] [/color][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1000112412][size=3][b][u][color=#00ff00]ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full[/color][/u]
[/b][/size][/url][size=3]I have also used[/size][color=#00ff00] [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1000024200][size=3][b][u][color=#00ff00]Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi - Variant - 2_0a[/color]
[/u][/b][/size][/url][size=3]Plus this[/size] [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1385][color=#00ff00][size=3][b]High Quality Eyes by Xenius[/b][/size][/color][/url]

[/u][size=4][color=#ffff00]Are there any problems with this mod I should think about?[/color]

[/size][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]As far as I know, you shouldn't have any problems with it. If you find any problems leave me a message or a comment on this mod.

[/size][/font][color=#ff0000][size=5]Note!!!
[/size][/color][size=4]If you use another mod that alters the appearance of Farkas and Vilkas in any way, you might not notice any difference from my mod, therefore it might help to load my mod first. The mod "Inhabitants Of Skyrim" is an example. I have used that before my mod in the load order, so that's why you can see no difference at Vilkas. (My guess.) 

[u]UPDATE TO NOTE:[/u] There might be a compatibility issue between this mod and Skyrim Romance mod. I will try to fix it when I have a bit more time for modding. [/size]


[color=#ff0000][size=5]Also check out:[/size]

[u][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61247/?]Daughters Of Dibella[/url][/size][/u][/color]
[size=4][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60677/?]Younger looking Sorex Vinius[/url][/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68146/?][u]BLMM - Better Looking Marriageable Men[/u][/url]
[u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60761/?]Summon undead - Conjure Skeleton Spell[/url][/u][/size][u][size=4]

[/size][/u]
[color=#00ffff][size=5]Feel free to make mod requests. I am always glad to hear from you. :) You can also send me pictures you have taken with my mods.[/size][/color]

[size=5][color=#d5a6bd]Enjoy the new Farkas and Vilkas! ☺[/color]
[/size]

[i][size=3]jodidovahkiin[/size][/i]
author: jodidovahkiin
